content.description: Just right of a long overhang at the base is an easy access on to the upper wall. This line goes straight up an overhanging faint "buttress" on small fractured holds and loose rock. This route is a memorable lead for good climbers looking for a bold, almost scary lead. This route is sketchy on multiple levels or it's an interesting .10 TR.
content.location:
It is located about 40' right of

Black Planet

, in the center of the crag.

content.description:
Climb the first 3 bolts of

Black Planet

, then go up and left to a 10' overhanging wall (.8). Above, go straight up then step right to the

Black Planet

belay. This is the best intro to the crag and the best way to access the top.
content.location:
It is left of

Black Magic

and starts as for

Blacksmith

and

Black Planet

.

content.description:
The route climbs straight up to the last bolt of

Black Power

and finishes at its chains, 60'. The rock is solid but dusty. This is a good, safe, overhanging lead.

Climb the first 3 bolts of

Black Planet

, then traverse ledge 20' left to overhanging bolt line on black wall just right of roof band to chains. This is a bit loose, but it is a good lead.

This climbs a right-facing corner with solid rock and good bolts. If you follow the bolts direct through the bulge, it's well-protected .10c, 55'. If you step left before the bulge, it's .10a PG-13 with the crux being the traverse right back on route. This is the most solid rock on the crag and one of the best to lead.
content.location:
Start 10' to 15' right of

Scary Monster

.

content.description: On the left side of the south face is some red/pink rock that leads to 2 bolts. Step right at the bolts, then go up and right to a bolt line up a bulging black wall. 2 overhangs, both .9+/10a , are climbed. The cruxes are loose and not recommended as an onsight lead. It is a fun 10a TR and my favorite warm-up.
content.location:
It is left of

Black Magic

.

content.description:
Start up

Scary Monster

on easy rock, then go left to the bolt line right of the gully and left of the overhanging bolted "buttress" (

Scary Monster

). Strange cruxes and some loose holds make it a good .10 TR or a tough 10c onsight.
content.location:
This is located 10' to 15' left of

Scary Monster

.
